module: Module-level comment: The `altera_up_av_config_auto_init_ob_de10_standard` module initializes audio and video settings on the DE10-standard board. It accepts a `rom_address` input to access specific audio and video ROMs and merges the fetched data using a bitwise OR operation, outputting the combined 27-bit `rom_data`. The module integrates audio and video initialization through submodules, each contributing to the final configuration output.
